post.body: Yeah, but you also have Daleks. I'm not sure the trade off is worth it - I'd rather not be exterminated.
I refuse to tweet.
Could Bendis beat Quesada? You pick the battlefield.
No flying cars yet. Guess I'll have to wait another year.
The world will look up and shout "Happy New Year!" and I'll whisper, "Check out my latest entries about Watchmen & 2008" - http://is.gd/cOwx
Oh God. Arguing semantics AND Spider-Man on the CBR forums. I've hit a completely brand new low.
Finally got around to setting up the multiple monitors. This works great. In other news, new Friday Night Fight - http://is.gd/dCaf
Just wrote some blog thoughts about THAT particular page from Ultimatum #2. Needless to say, there's spoilers - http://is.gd/drXf
Trying to explain my nephew and niece that fireworks won't hit them on the head. More amused than I should be.
I've been out of commission for too long. Happy Holidays twitter people!
You know what would make Ultimate Spider-Man an even better game? A mode to re-play the boss fights.
Two more Christmas posts are up, one Nostalgia Sunday coming up next! http://is.gd/cOwx
Finally got that video card working! I can move on with my life now.
Whew. Busy days. New LCD screen = Totally awesome. New printer = Actually working. New video card = Making me crash every five minutes. Sigh
Holiday special time! Time to search for that Christmas spirit. http://rurl.org/196v
Found a nifty application to use Twitter from my desktop, automatic updates and alerts included - http://rurl.org/g4
Still listening to Ice Ice Baby. What is wrong with me?
Just finished watching the last episode of Death Note - Damn that was good.

Hey guys, anyone needs to smile?
http://tinyurl.com/5k38f8
Just wrote a short review of Cooliris, an awesome app for image/video 3d browsing - http://nerdosity.blogspot.com/
